offer_summary.job_description: This is an engineering leadership role responsible for implementing the technology strategy and execution for digital platforms (e-commerce) that align with our product strategy and meet business goals. The candidate must have a deep understanding of modern technology stacks, focus on customer experience, and demonstrate success in software development and delivering strategic solutions.
requirements: [10+ years' experience working in software development]
[Proven track record of building technology development teams is mandatory]
requiered_skills: [A broad understanding of IT principles, frameworks and methodologies including TOGAF, Agile, Scrum, DevOps, ITIL with extensive experience planning and managing complex technology projects utilising these methodologies]
[A Comprehensive understanding of cloud technologies, AWS a must]
[Experience across Java script frontend technologies, SAP Hybris and Commerce tools]
nice_to_have_skills: [10+ years working in complex eCommerce organisations]
[A passion for innovation, technology, and digital transformation]
[Strong leadership capability demonstrated through previous experience leading IT teams, where you have motivated and cultivated a team of professionals]
benefits: [Sharing the costs of professional training & courses]
